bibl.title: I.Pan 70, a dedication from the year 133 BC
bibl.note: Excavations in the central temple in Berenike in January 2019 documented a fragmentary Greek inscription. It belongs to I. Pan 70. Reedition of the inscription (including the new "fr. c").
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast, I.Pan 70, a Dedication from the Year 133 BC.
Excavations in the central temple in Berenike in January 2019 documented a fragmentary Greek inscription. It belongs to I. Pan 70. Reedition of the inscription (including the new "fr. c").
